cases.title: Drones Expert Witness May Testify on Remote ID
cases.description: Drones Expert Witness may soon testify on the FAA's ability to remotely identify operators of drones.

cases.title: Ergonomics Expert Witness Testifies in "Weedwacker" Case
cases.description: The court ruled an Ergonomics Expert Witness could testify in a products liability case involving the use of a "weedwacker."

cases.title: Pathology Expert Witness Allowed to be Paid from Bond
cases.description: A Pathology Expert Witness in a 45 year old murder case could be paid from defendant's bond, the court ruled.
